abstract: Career employees concluded that the way to lift the aid freeze was for someone to make a direct appeal to President Trump.
lead_paragraph: Given the extraordinary control that the White House has maintained over testimony and the release of emails, text messages and other documents by top Trump administration aides, there has been little evidence in the public domain to back up John Boltonâ€™s claims that top White House advisers repeatedly pressed President Trump this summer to release his hold on the military aid to Ukraine.
